profileSummary: Dynamic Fullstack Engineer with over 4 years of experience specializing in ReactJS, NextJs, NodeJs, and blockchain technologies. Proven expertise in developing scalable, high-availability web and blockchain applications, with a strong foundation in microservices architecture and cloud technologies. Passionate about leveraging modern web technologies to drive innovation in fintech and Web3 domains.

achievements: Led the design and implementation of a blockchain-based NFT marketplace, enhancing digital asset management and transaction speeds by 25%.
Engineered microservices with Spring Boot, improving system efficiency by 40%.
Integrated AWS CloudWatch and EC2 for robust application monitoring, reducing downtime by 30%.
Spearheaded the deployment of CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, enhancing code quality through automated testing.
rolesAndResponsibilities: Developed and maintained full-stack web and blockchain applications ensuring high quality and timely delivery.
Utilized end-to-end architecture to develop front-end UI using JavaScript (JS), React, and integrating cryptocurrency and blockchain protocols such as web3 and GraphQL.
Led a 15-person team, driving strategic insights for 2 product teams and contributing to revenue growth and blockchain advancements.
Managed end-to-end development lifecycle, from design to deployment, ensuring compliance with best practices.

achievements: Provided technical leadership in developing React applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
Optimized project architecture to enhance scalability and maintainability of React applications.
Developed Java-based web applications incorporating Spring MVC, achieving a 98% pass rate on first-run tests.
Employed AWS services for deployment, achieving high availability and resilience.
rolesAndResponsibilities: Collaborated with team members to architect and develop high-quality web applications.
Took ownership of technical development, design, and delivery, implementing RESTful APIs for seamless integration.
Promoted to Frontend Lead, facilitating direct client interactions for requirement gathering and overall development.
Led frontend development projects, improving user engagement through intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.

achievements: Contributed to the development of web applications using Angular and React, adopting agile methodologies.
Implemented RESTful web services for dynamic data retrieval, improving application responsiveness.
Gained foundational experience in web technologies, focusing on creating responsive user interfaces.
Participated in live coding sessions, contributing to general programming challenges.
rolesAndResponsibilities: Assisted in building web applications with a focus on using TypeScript, React, and Node.js.
Collaborated closely with the team to support projects during all phases of delivery.
Engaged in unit testing, integration, and deployment of software products, ensuring high-quality releases.
Monitored website performance and rectified front-end-related issues, communicating technical issues effectively.

projects.name: Devolution World - Multiverse Blockchain NFT Game
projects.summary: A groundbreaking blockchain-based game leveraging NFTs for in-game assets, offering a transparent and fair asset distribution system.
rolesAndResponsibilities: Implemented Chainlink VRF for fair and transparent in-game asset distribution.
Developed smart contracts for NFT-based characters and items, resulting in over 100,000 unique assets.
Played a pivotal role in the decentralized infrastructure design, leading to a significant increase in user engagement.
Engineered a scalable backend supporting a peak concurrency of over 10,000 players.

projects.name: Agreed - SAAS Based Application
projects.summary: A collaborative SAAS platform designed to enhance decision-making and creativity within teams, securing million-dollar funding for development.
rolesAndResponsibilities: Drove frontend and backend integration, implementing complex features that fostered significant funding.
Coordinated with multidisciplinary teams for high-quality code delivery and backend service alignment.
Engaged in extensive testing and debugging, maintaining high software quality and reliability.
Led API lifecycle from creation to deployment, ensuring robust and scalable service architecture.

projects.name: KEC - Blockhour Digitalization
projects.summary: A comprehensive digital ecosystem including a web-based application and PWA to enhance productivity and decision-making during block hour activities.
rolesAndResponsibilities: Engineered client and server-side components for a digital ecosystem, developing a PWA for mobile optimization.
Directed API development and integration, employing MSSQL and RabbitMQ for efficient data management.
Collaborated with backend teams to implement response strategies, improving system-wide communication.
Contributed to substantial productivity gains by leveraging digital initiatives throughout the value chain.
